front.title: Bulk Re-registration for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 specification requires the Mobile Access Gateway(MAG) to send a separate Proxy Binding Update (PBU) message to theLocal Mobility Agent (LMA) for each mobile node (MN) to renew theMN's mobility binding. This document defines a mechanism by which aMAG can update the mobility bindings of multiple MNs attached to itwith a single PBU message to the serving LMA. This document alsospecifies a new mobility option that can be used by the mobilityentities in a Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain for carrying the groupaffiliation of a mobile node in any of the mobility signalingmessages.
